intro_description: Passionate about creating intuitive user experiences, I turn ideas into concrete realities through programming.
bio: After working as a nurse for 20 years, I've learned the value of <Highlight>team work</Highlight>. This experience greatly benefits me in web development. My <Highlight>rigor</Highlight> and <Highlight>listening skills</Highlight>, acquired in the medical world, guide me in every project. I know how important it is to collaborate and understand the needs of others, whether they are patients or <Highlight>website users</Highlight>. Every line of code I write reflects this <Highlight>human-centered</Highlight> approach.
project_0_description: Personal project developed in React, this website presents a variety of cooking recipes.
project_1_description: Clone of the Météo France homepage made solely with HTML and CSS.
